item.title: 📜 shareAI-lab/analysis_claude_code (5170 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: shareAI-lab

📝 Repository: shareAI-lab/analysis_claude_code

📄 Descrizione: 本仓库包含对 Claude Code v1.0.33 进行逆向工程的完整研究和分析资料。包括对混淆源代码的深度技术分析、系统架构文档，以及重构 Claude Code agent 系统的实现蓝图。主要发现包括实时 Steering 机制、多 Agent 架构、智能上下文管理和工具执行管道。该项目为理解现代 AI agent 系统设计和实现提供技术参考。

⭐ Stelle: 5170

🍴 Forks: 930

💻 Linguaggio: JavaScript

📜 Licenza: Apache License 2.0

⏰ Creato il: 2025-06-29T15:34:15Z

🔄 Ultimo Aggiornamento: 2025-07-22T03:22:46Z

Visita il Repository su GitHub

]]>

item.title: 🐍 davidkimai/Context-Engineering (3284 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: davidkimai

📝 Repository: davidkimai/Context-Engineering

📄 Descrizione: "Context engineering is the delicate art and science of filling the context window with just the right information for the next step." — Andrej Karpathy. A frontier, first-principles handbook inspired by Karpathy and 3Blue1Brown for moving beyond prompt engineering to the wider discipline of context design, orchestration, and optimization.

⭐ Stelle: 3284

🍴 Forks: 330

💻 Linguaggio: Python

📜 Licenza: MIT License
